<html><DIV id=cdiv>
<P>Quickstrike: <BR><BR><BR><BR><BR><BR><BR>Quickstrike tried to think what <EM>Could you please? </EM>meant. That was one of a few words that he didn't understand. But when she said she would like that, it meant to him that he should go find her some quarters. He nodded. 
<P>Before he put his foot out of walk off, he saw Black Arachnia walk in. She went straight to Dark Mouse, but he quivered the curving metal strips at the side of his cheeks and grinned at her. He looked at them both.
<P>"Ah'll find one fer ya. Ah'll be back t' show it t' ya." He walked out of the room, into the hallway.</P></DIV><p><hr>Get Your Private, Free E-mail from MSN Hotmail at <a href="http://www.hotmail.com/">http://www.hotmail.com</a><br></html>
